greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of units u in Z/nZ such that Phi(3,u) is a unit, where Phi is the cyclotomic polynomial.
comment: The number of units u in Z/nZ such that Phi(1,u) or Phi(2,u) is a unit is given by A058026.
link: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000 (terms to 1000 from Jordan Lenchitz)
maple: m:=3; T:=[]: for n from 2 to 1000 do S:={}: for a from 0 to n-1 do if gcd(a,n)=1 and gcd(cyclotomic(m,a),n)=1 then S:={op(S),a}: fi: od: T:=[op(T),nops(S)]: od: print(m,T):
mathematica: Table[Count[Map[Cyclotomic[3, #] &, Select[Range@ n, CoprimeQ[#, n] &]], u_ /; CoprimeQ[u, n]], {n, 72}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 11 2017 *)
program: a(n)=my(f=factor(n)); prod(i=1,#f~, g(f[i,1]^f[i,2])) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jul 06 2017
results.author: _Jordan Lenchitz_, _Michael Mueller_, _Tristan Phillips_, _Madison Wellen_, _Eric Jovinelly_, _Joshua Harrington_, Jul 06 2017
